content: * this is the ad-free easy to print pdf version of this pattern you can find the free version on my website theturtletrunk com * the country cottage cozy is a quick and easy crochet cup & can cozy instructions include both a cozy sleeve and a cozy with a base and they fit on a 12oz & 16oz cup or can these are going to be perfect for stocking stuffers or last minute holiday gifts plus they use under 50 yards each so you can use any left over yarn you have finished size approximately 3 5 tall x 8 in circumference 4 wide when laid flat difficulty advanced beginner / easy standard us crochet terms pattern includes - detailed written instructions - gauge pattern - link to the free video tutorial - special stitch instructions with photos - photos for reference supplies needed medium 4 weight yarn 5 00mm h hook yarn needle and scissors
